subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees inched closer to a wild-card berth, but only because of losses by the Twins and the Angels. After a bullpen collapse, the Yankees must wait at least another day to clinch.
snippet: The Yankees inched closer to a wild-card berth, but only because of losses by the Twins and the Angels. After a bullpen collapse, the Yankees must wait at least another day to clinch.
